text: Smoking and ETOH cessation for greater than 1 month Fasting: Clear fluids >2hrs Solids > 6hours Thoracic epidural (midthoracic T5-8) -Superior pain relief -Fewer respiratory complications -Reduced insulin resistance IV analgesia options recommended: -1V lignocaine infusion -PCA Blocks: -Weak evidence for TAP blocks (mainly recommended in lower abdominal surgery) Multimodal PONV Avoid hypothermia -Reduced wound infection -Reduced bleeding/ reduced transfusions -Reduced recovery time -Reduced cardiac complications
